definitions: (of an area of land) having had the earth turned up with a plow, especially before sowing
shortDefinitions: (of area of land) having had earth turned up with plough, especially before sowing

definitions: (of a road) having been cleared of snow using a snowplow

examples.text: we remained on the town's plowed streets rather than venturing onto the country roads

shortDefinitions: (of road) having been cleared of snow using snowplough
